en.title: About us
en.subtitle: We are a group of dedicated, passionate and ambitious individuals aiming to contribute positively to the preservation of the EOS platform and its community.

cn.title: 关于我们
cn.subtitle: 我们的团队敬业、充满激情且怀有雄心壮志。团队一直致力于发展、维护EOS平台和EOS社区，为之做出积极贡献。

pillars.description0: We're dedicated to fostering the EOS platform through reliable and efficient block production and community engagement.
pillars.description1: An EOS Nation Ambassador is an individual that is passionate about EOS projects and wants to play a part in that ecosystem.
pillars.description2: If EOS Nation is "elected" as Block Producer, two Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instances will be running as full EOS nodes.
